Data: Given I have requested a PDF report from the Checklists  and the report was successfully generated by the system
Action: When the system changes the report status to "Completed"
Expected Result: Then I receive an email without attachment, with a message about XXhour expiration and a link to the General Generated Reports tab

Data: Given I have requested a PDF report from the Checklists  and the system encountered an error
Action: When the system sends a failure notification to me
Expected Result: Then I receive an email explaining the issue, that support is handling it, and a link to the General Generated Reports

Data: Given I have a completed report from the Checklists  and I open the General Generated Reports tab
Action: When I click "Send to Email" and input a valid recipient address
Expected Result: Then the recipient receives an email with the report as attachment
